availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph H. Glover (Barren County, Kentucky, millwright)

body.p: Barren County, Kentucky, blacksmith and millwright. Kentucky native. Son of William Glover and Charity Glover. Married to Jane E. Glover. Blacksmith in Barren County, Kentucky, in 1850. Millwright in Barren County in 1860. Assigned arms by the Kentucky Military Board.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Division 2, p. 467A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, District 1, p. 893.
KYR-0001-019-0144.
